name: render aggregate_metric_double when missing min and max

body.query:
FROM test4
| EVAL a = TO_AGGREGATE_METRIC_DOUBLE(1)  // Temporary workaround to enable aggregate_metric_double
| KEEP agg_metric

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.2.0-e7346d3d2019ac2d50dfbf21b1dfdc97c3a85e50 "No limit defined, adding default limit of [1000]"
